column3: â€œI am rating for the first time because of some comments in the ratings. As a patient of severe and debilitating pain most of my life,  this strain is wonderful. It helps with fibro, nerve and bone pain, sleep, and everything in between. I was able to get this medicine at my local dispensary ONCE. And it went fast, so it must have been grown and handled correctly. If you find some and it doesnt give you the relief I d...â€

â€œDark Star is an amazing CBD-heavy Indica with amazing painkilling properties (IMO very close to those of codeine-syrup) and an amazing sensation of relaxation and cerebral peace. I've had both of this strain's parents (Mazar-I-Sharif and Purple Kush) and they're also both amazing Indicas with strong relaxation effects too. Unlike it's parents, Dark Star also contains more CBD-to-THC and thus is a better painkiller (q...â€
â€œBy far this lands in my top 10 strains, NOT FOR THE NOVICE!!! This had me nodding out about an hour and slept Ike a rock. Beautiful dense tight flower it's expensive but worth it.â€

â€œThe only thing I don't like about this strain is that I only grew one plant!!!
I got the seeds free and after reading up on how strong Dark Star was and since my wife (Stage3c OvarianCancer) and I (Epilepsy) just started vaporizing for the first times in our lives, I didn't want to grow it until we got used to some others.  

My next grow will be a minimum of 4 plants because Dark Star is Awesome for Pain/Nausea from...â€
â€œDark Star is amazing. I find it difficult to find indicas that really sedate me. Dark Star and Afghani have really earned their spots on my top 10.â€

â€œHe ain't heavy... he's my brother... unless he's been smoking Darkstar. Then it's like trying to shift Jupiter from orbit. Heavy, heavy indica. Only one I've found that will reliably put me down and put me OUT. Taste is... alright, it tastes like shit. Specifically,  you get pine, lime, wood and then chemical/plastic on the end. So no, this is not a tasty herb. Unless you like smoking those little green tree air fres...â€

â€œThis strain smells like lime and pine trees, so it's very refreshing. The taste reminds me of granola and pine nuts, it's neutral and earthy with a hint of lime. Dark star is a great strain if you want to feel clear headed and happy, with pain relief included. This strain makes it much easier to focus, and it's almost psychoactive since it makes everything appear more HD. Be warned though: Have munchies readily avail...â€

â€œGreat strain for pain and muscle spasm! I really like this strain, with in a few minutes pain was gone and a space feeling comes over you. For me this is an evening pain relief. It also mellows you out. I recommend trying this strain if it's in your area. The spacey feeling reminds me of Mars Og with the body feeling like Purple Kush, Great combo!â€

â€œMy fave strain to turn those blues into sunny skies..... or more bearable than it would be without this strain!!! 

It is good for pms and taking away tears and anxiety!! I can always count on this strain, and it's a positive to know the grower ğŸ˜âœŒğŸ’¨ğŸ’¨â€

â€œThis is one of the most potent and crazy indica strains I've ever encountered. It starts out as a relaxed buzz and before you know it, you've been taken to a parallel universe. I felt like my brain was melting and everything I saw looked like a cartoon. It's 12 hours later, the next day and I'm still feeling a constant sense of peace and calm. This strain is definitely appropriate for anxiety but only if you are in a...â€

â€œI love Dark Star for bedtime. It's euphoric and spacey enough to keep me amused while being heavy enough to knock my wife out with two bowls... somehow we both get exactly what we want in the same strain. White Tara from Harmony Farms and Granddaddy Purple  fall in the same category.

Took an eighth camping a couple weeks ago... it was a group thing and I figured I'd better bring extra to share, and just as I expecte...â€

â€œGot this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA.  Check my blog out AgingEnt.com

column3: â€œI'm giving Dark Star five stars for one reason .... it puts me to sleep and improves the amount of time I stay asleep.  I go all Granddad on this stuff...my family members find me nodded out watching The Golden Girls ..... Dark Star strain provides a pleasant, somewhat heavy high before The Sandman shows up. Winner, winner .....â€

â€œThis new and amazing strain is so beyond welcome.  Very deep stone,  no pain, panic and a very calming stone.  A little goes a long way but a little more will put your body into deep space. Great for anxiety a+â€

â€œGreat old school Indica. Powerful, but calming, pain relieving, and euphoric without anxiety or paranoia. Relieved a migraine very effectively.  Good strain for when you still want to function in reality. but want ti do so in a more relaxed and stress free way.â€

â€œHigh people, how are you? I want to clarify something... scullerymaid is commenting on a dark star review board and is writing about death star and I'm kind of confused. So could you please elaborate and let us know if it was death star or dark star? Thank you.

if u do not suffer any chronic ailments or severe pain, yes...it will put you down.
also, as i stated in my previous rating...IF YOU ARE NOT GETTING THE RESULTS AND FLAVOR PROFILE I DESCRIBED, ITS NOT DARK STAR OR ITS CHOCK FULL OF CHEMICALS.
When you smoke cannabis as God intended, its always pleasant. The...â€

â€œThis strain is amazing for pain. I have not experienced a strong physical high like this one. This is great for pain relief, or deep relaxation. 

What to watch for this weed: Documentaries, Forest Gump, Breaking Bad 

Not for: construction work, climbing to tall places(if afraid of heights), cutting large fruit like watermelon, pineapple, coconut. even though coconuts are seeds. I just learned that because I'm willi...â€

â€œAs someone diagnosed with insomnia this particular strain is a life saver. Working third shift doesn't really allow for much sleep in general but with Dark Star sleep no longer feels like something just out of reach.â€

â€œPungent and soothing, that's the two words that come to mind when you partake in Dark Star. Not a very impressive Indica however, lacks punch when compared to other Indica strains. â€œMk ultra powerful. Excellent and highly effective for inflammation and chronic pain. What I obtained from my local dispensary was packed full of medicine with a heavy white crystalline sheen. Definitely night time use only. Heavy heavy heavy couchlock. Almost a narcotic like effect and actually I would only recommend this one for the most severe and intractable pain nights. Definitely don't need to be taking this one...â€

â€œalso, you have nothing to prove. its medicine, use as such. 
too many people are trying to outsmoke each other...then your stuck for hours wondering if yer gonna die, rite? 
if u take any rx, do u take how prescribed or eat the whole bottle at once? 
its not rocket science. its medicine. everybody has different needs. key word...needs. use what u need, not what u think will impress anyone. 
dont be a sheep. be yourse...â€

I can listen to garbage modern rap artists and enjoy their musical entertainment experience. If you can, definitely swing by your local...â€

â€œI am a chronic pain pt. and suffer from a motorcycle accident 2yrs ago and Dark Star...well, it definitely helps with EVERYTHING! Pain. TBI-(and. the problems associated) Fractured c3-5... etc. from accident. Depression. Fibro. Insomnia, n so on.

â€œfirst encounter with the strain today and I am satisfied. Really nice looking bud, with a nice purple center. the smoke was smooth and flavorful. a good pine taste when exhaling! â€œIt has a very strong aroma even when contained. The smell is very skunky then to take a closer smell it was becoming more sweet and berries.
   Smoking it (via bong) has a very immediate sweet taste. Its followed by a harsh wood taste.
   The high is immediately relaxing and cerebral. As time goes on the cbd kicks in and relaxes your body. The high then becomes subtle. 
   This definitely is a great strain. 9/10â€

â€œNot the strongest in the cupboard, but the flavor is intense. Like the same intensity as Sour D. Macro shots of this strain show areas of purple and total coverage of frost. When I first got this strain, It slammed my eye's shut and kicked me back. I'm used to it a couple of days in.

â€œOne of the best pain relief strains I've used. Easy to grow too.â€

â€œSuper chill indica that destroyed any anxiety/depression in my way as well as helping tremendously with my ptsd. Solid 9/10. Thank beach boys deliver! 10/10 delivery service that treats us patients right.â€

â€œIt has a very strong aroma even when contained. The smell is very skunky then to take a closer smell it was becoming more sweet and berries.
   Smoking it (via bong) has a very immediate sweet taste. Its followed by a harsh wood taste.
   The high is immediately relaxing and cerebral. As time goes on the cbd kicks in and relaxes your body. The high then becomes subtle. 
   This definitely is a great strain. 9/10â€
â€œShould be called DANK STAR"â€"
â€œGood high for after a long day.â€
â€œHeavy and effective sedation. A potent indica that achieves what it sets out to doâ€

â€œIf you need to unwind , this is the way. Great for any kind of pain relief. Fantastic for lack of appetite , better have some snacks and drinks handy. You can definitely feel the cerebral in the high. Dope.â€

â€œDid a reviee before but thought i should say an update. the batch i got was cured pretty badly so i turned it into edibles. smoking that batch was super harsh and unflavorful. it just was unpleasant. ik its not the strain fault though. so after making some edibles (brownies from budder i made), the effects were super body stoned. my body became numb but not super numb like some other strains. super relaxed. really fe...â€

â€œThe plant grew very vigorously and big. I set a new personal record (and then some) with the final yield. The smoke tastes good and the buzz is intense, but it does expand a lot in the lungs leading to coughing. Thatâ€™s probably my biggest complaint. Dark star has a definite ceiling and once you reach it you just ainâ€™t gonna get any higher no matter how much you smoke. Iâ€™d definitely categorize this as a night-time sm...â€

â€œThis strain is fire.  Ive been looking for a 100% indica around my area for awhile. $4 for 20.9% thc Darkstar. it was too good to pass up. This strain is so sedating its definitely my top 5. great for sleep and pain. you will wake up refreshedâ€

â€œWhat's not to like? I went looking for an Indica and i got it. I'm a lightweight so two deep hits off a pipe and I'm floating...or maybe gently cushioned in a bed of clouds. For me it's a contemplative stone. Things like do animals run  for fun? Like
column4: we see a deer running and think it's scared and running from something. But maybe it's running cuz it feels good or just getting their cardio in for the day".

column3:
â€œGreat for Pain if you still need to function after burning.
Intense smell.â€
â€œGreat relaxing strain, full body melt...become one with the couchâ€

â€œNot the strongest in the cupboard, but the flavor is intense. Like the same intensity as Sour D. Macro shots of this strain show areas of purple and total coverage of frost. When I first got this strain, It slammed my eye's shut and kicked me back. I'm used to it a couple of days in. 
   I hear this has the Purple Kush and Mazar I Sharif for parents. I hardly ever get to smoke any solid indicia's. Mostly hybrids and ...â€

â€œI really like this strain is gives you a calm relaxed cerebral high. While also giving you a very good body high. This strain is definitely a couch melter. This is a great strain if you are just trying to chill out.â€

â€œThe latest variety to join the T.H. Seeds fleet is the devastatingly strong Darkstarâ„¢. This mega Indica not only grows ridiculously dense buds, but the potency is out of this world. Darkstarâ„¢ is a great plant for those seeking pain relief, appetite enhancement and other worldly activities. Darkstarâ„¢ is a dream to grow with its high calyx to leaves ratio, making it a breeze to manicure. So grab some Darkstarâ„¢ today an...â€
â€œI tasted some mint and then earthy tones. It's part Afghani so there are more crystals than a regular indica. Knocked my depression out but gave me a little anxiety. Good smoke!â€
â€œamazing might be my top strain ever! love the brain relaxation!!! as well as helping physical painâ€
â€œOne of the best Indica strains I've ever smoked.....awesome cerebral high that puts you to bed.â€
â€œBrought out me Irish!  Made me stumble around singing Flogging Molly songs and yell like a pirate!  Eased me back pains too!  Arrr!â€
â€œGood flavor and good pain relief and then very sound sleep.â€

â€œVery woodsy taste; when burnt in the pipe, it made this sound like someone squeezing a plastic bottle. Not a strong high, just kind of a lazy daze. Good if you don't really plan on doing much. Just kicking back and soothing yourself.â€
â€œThis is deff. my favorite. Very relaxin', easier to fall asleep.â€
â€œI smoked dark star for the first time last night and I love the heavy relaxed feeling. My favorite felling was the body tingling.â€

â€œVery soothing cerebral high. Was really blown away by this recommendation. It's a subtle thing and when it takes you, it lifts and flows off with you.

Great for medicating pain and calming your mind. Over step it and you'll be soaring through the cosmos.
 

I've had this both in Flower form and concentrate. Both with varied results but I keep each on hand depending on my mood. Concentrate will give more of a euphori...â€
â€œThis is absolutely my favorite strain for sleep. Warm body relief that comes in waves and it put a smile on your face like some good hash. 10/10â€
â€œYes, find the right grower and this strain worked wonders door my anxiety ... and cbd rich makes for relaxing w/ good pain controlâ€

â€œSo, I opened the bag and pull out the tony nuggets. They crack crumble, but find nicely into my grinder. It grinds easy too. Smells like the pines of my state. The smoke itself is natural feeling and mellow. guess it taste like pine, bark, sap, general pine tree. The high is very mellow and floaty. Real nice gentle sailing. Leaves real soft ash behind when cashed.â€
â€œExcellent for pain.  Extremely relaxing, I sleep amazing after using this.   Good for stress and anxiety as well.â€
â€œThe This is the best I've ever tried, hands down the best!â€
â€œThis is definitely a night life strain, it's a heavy high but your in control, it has a relaxing heavy feeling in your body and a light feeling like an air head lolâ€
â€œA good indica for anxiety since it mellows both mind and body.â€

â€œA true powerhouse Indica! Very dense, rather monotone coloured nugs. A heavy smoke that can leave you totally baked, even after just a few tokes.

Chopping up a bud, the smell was indeed sour - a bit cat pissy but in a pleasant(?) way. Fuely, dank...When ignited, the taste was nice but I endured a slight harshness or bite".

column1: I like my Indica and Indica-dominant strains

column3: â€œvery chill weed with, tense relaxation perfect for a night ofnlaziness , great weed to help insomnia!â€

â€œA bud with a lot of pleasant qualities from The Green Room
The smell and taste is sweet and dank with undertones of blueberries.
The high is a definite mood elevator with lots of laughs and smooth creativity. Doesn't seem to act like a stimulant or a depressant to the body which is mellow and fits any mood.â€
â€œIt's strong. But definitely not the best smelling or tasting stuff I've had.â€
â€œ1 gram made me mellow and happier. On a different occasion 3 grams put me to sleep in less than 30 minutes. If D.S OG is available, I would get that first.â€
â€œgot me pretty sleepy, dark star crashingâ€
â€œI have horrible insomnia. With this strain I felt relaxed while smoking it and I slept all night and woke up happy! ğŸ˜Šâ€
â€œThis is a very heavy stoner the effects are very strong! Also the looks of the buds are very nice they turn out very dense. Smell and taste are unique.â€

â€œThis is one of the best Indicas that I have on my menu- the unusually high levels of thc and cbd make this a premier medicine that can help those looking to relax or those who suffer from some pretty serious medical issues.â€
â€œThe first time I tried this strain I couldn't even feel my balls .  Love it.â€
â€œon some outer space shitâ€

â€œThis is an absolute keeper in my mom room, and my head stash jar.  
My Dark Star has tested as high as 26% total thc.  
The high is very clear and euphoric for such an indica-dominant strain, and it comes on so fast, its almost uncomfortable if you are not prepared for it.  
Maybe I just got very lucky with the keeper I chose, but I think this strain is incredibly underrated.  
Amazing for back pain and depression.â€
â€œMuy buena! Sobre todo para disfrutar en una noche de relax!â€
â€œThis is my favorite strain, it's hard to come by.  Love itâ€
â€œThis strain is very good for those who have insomnia,  so I would recommend using it before bed. it will put you right to sleep if you let it.â€
â€œGreat Taste and Smell. Every time I smoke this strain I get a heavy head high and get in a great mood. DEFINITELY in my top 10!â€

â€œThis strain is definitely a good one. The batch I got had huge pale green nugs with light copper hairs, it was very dense and sticky (even left my fingers sticky) with a strong and pungent earthy pine smell to it. It has a smooth smoke, and packs a powerful body and head high that begin to creep over you after about three hits. Not my favorite as far as smell and taste, but a lovely indica for sure.â€
â€œMagnificent.â€
â€œFantastic. Nice and mellow, rolling waves of relaxation.â€

â€œfairly decent indica got me what I needed for medication purposes and had a good skunky hash Afghani taste very lime green with Sarah orange hairs. smells very skunky and piney. got an oz for $160 so had a good amount to give it a fair review. good for insomnia , and pain, or if you get worked up to get calmed down.â€
â€œSuper mellow intense highâ€

â€œTied for the highest THC medicine I ever tried so far as or of current date 3-2-17 at 29% from the always awesome Eugene OG. The price was decent as well which is always appreciated. So fantastic tasting, and I can't wait to have this strain again, and make a visit to Eugene OG!â€
â€œVery relaxing. It got me in a good mood and made me sleepy. Good for stress and insomnia.â€

â€œThis was great!  A heavy indica that I used to help fall asleep.  The effects hit me pretty quickly after vaporizing and I felt very, very relaxed and calm.  Completely stress-free and made me very sleepy!â€
â€œone phat dab of this intensely wonderful indica and blast off! good day time high. keeps your mind thinking. Dark Star for the win!â€
â€œindica is the best! This Lil baby right here was nice and soft, with visible crystals and a perfect flavorful finish. you'll never go wrong with purple.â€
â€œOne of the best strains I have had.  It gave me an incredibly relaxed sensation, really great if you in the mood to veg and chill.â€
â€œFor an indica,  it was not that stoney.    A mild relaxing effect at best .  Flavor was not exciting via vaping.   Possibly a woody flavor.â€
â€œI suffer from PTSD, severe anxiety, and depression. I also just had a hysterectomy.  This strain eased my pain and anxiety. I have to say it is one of the best strains I've ever had.â€

â€œgreetings. I just tried this strain and it couldn't have came at a better time. my feet as well as my legs have been hurt for a while and dark star is true to its name and all that it has promised. DS hit me quick and quiet relaxed all my pain and my mind at the same time. slowed down my ever racing mind to enjoy the moments. The dry mouth hit me 15 min in and it wasn't even a problem because my body was so relaxed a...â€
â€œGood morning weed. Makes me wanna do stuff, but a little anxious. Very energetic.â€
â€œgood weed definitely calming not an anxious highâ€
â€œI give this strain a 4.5. Dark Star is very relaxing and very nice to the taste. I enjoyed sitting down and just chilling.â€
â€œPretty Good, I took about 7 hits off a pipe and I had a pretty strong buzz. I can definitely feel the tingly feeling. It helped with a headache and helped my legs stop hurting. Not a bad strain.â€
â€œvery strong effects almost instant effects bodyâ€
â€œgreat for all day use!!â€
â€œA nice, strong body high for me, but I frequently get panic attacks on this particular strain.â€
â€œmore like 3.5 starsâ€
â€œThis strain is special! One of those that works for anything as well as allowing you to be productive without pain ! Wish i had a lot of this one!â€

â€œHella mellow strain.  I love the build up to this even high, and enjoy multiple bong rips to keep the high going.  Great for getting close to bed time, and a perfect night sleep with a refreshed feeling in the morning.  I will defiantly buy a few more grams of this one.  The bud tender at Ganja Goddess delivered on this recommendation.  Thanks Aaron!â€
â€œA nice heavy buzz in the morning, that gets you in a great mood in no time!â€

â€œProbably the best indica ive had in a minute. Body high is amazing, sleep never better.â€

â€œEpic Indica. Delivers a strong couch lock and good for pain relief. not a strong odor or taste but reminds of a classic. Covered in trichomes and very impressive. medium yield but worth it. made some Co2 shatter rods which got featured in Dope Magazine's December 2015 issue and I must say, it rates it. may be my current favorite Indicaâ€

â€œAs an aid for relaxing in to sleep ALONE, Dark Star is premium smoke.  Before the nod sets in, however, it is a pleasant trip - a mellow head and relaxed body leading to pain and stress relief.  Mmmm, let me hang out there with Dark Star ....â€

â€œOne of the best highs I've ever had - a super potent strain that sends out instant relaxation. A high compariable to one when you just started smoking weed. Honestly one of my favourite strains out there.â€

â€œA must have for pain. killer high + killer pain relief. This strain is Awesome.â€

â€œOne of my favorites! This strain makes me feel very relaxed and creative. I love to use it before bed or while painting. The strong berry taste is great as well :) I hope I can find it again in my area. Would make an amazing shatter!â€
